CustomField.description: Type of Support Case that can be created. The name of the records depends on the type: If incident - 1000n - example 100001, 100002, etc If Complaint - 2000n - example 200001, 200002, etc If Question - 3000n - example 300001, 300002, etc If Request New - 4000n - example 400001, 400002, etc
CustomField.label: Type
